title: Jade Empire™: Special Edition

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) Haswell Mobile x86/MMX/SSE2
notes: Launch the game then alt+tab, open a terminal and type " taskset -p 4 "$(pidof JadeEmpire.exe)" " and alt+tab again. It works flawlessly with this workaround.
title: Jade Empire™: Special Edition
